text:
I am creating a component with a ChoiceField using `multiple={true}`. I am using Typescript:
```<ChoiceField
  label="Test"
  name="test"
  multiple={true}
  choices={[
    ["one", "one"],
    ["two", "two"],
    ["three", "three"],
  ]}
  display="select"
></ChoiceField>```
When generating the types using the dev server flag `--generateFieldsTypes`, it generates the following:
```test: "one" | "two" | "three";```
Shouldn't it be an array?
are there any helpers to get cookie consent status on the react side? Do I need to try to pull off of window?
